name: Hotel Dash™ Suite Success™
description: When Quinn's new travel business hits a snag, she needs Flo's patented elbow grease to help renovate and run hotels all over DinerTown™! As Flo, you will deliver guest's luggage, drop off room service and provide extra towels, blankets and anything else they may need to stay happy and leave big tips!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, XP SP1 & 2Processor: Pentium IV 1.2 Ghz processor or fasterMemory: 256 MB RAMHard Drive: 40 MB of free space

reviews.review_text: I love this game! This and all the Diner Dash Games.
